attributes.review: I got this app genuinely to see what Trump’s agenda would be if he were to win and what his promises are for his next campaign. All that I got from the news section was Biden bashing. What are YOU bringing to the table, Trump? Make this app more about why we should vote for you rather than why we shouldn’t vote for Biden.
attributes.title: Biden, Biden, Biden

attributes.review: I got this app before but after letting it sit on my phone for a bit glitches started happening. And suddenly, BLACK screen!!😭 I had to get a new phone cause my old one got bricked!! So yes, please do get this app if you want a good way to trash a perfectly good phone.

attributes.review: This was a terrible app. It caused my phone to crash many times and I think it hacked my phone. My mom texted me ten minutes after I downloaded the app saying she got a message from the app telling her that I was in a car crash. This is unacceptable and I am disgusted.
